forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers likely and possibly a thunderstorm during the morning, then some lingering showers still possible this afternoon. High near 15C. WSW winds at 25 to 40 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers likely and possibly a thunderstorm during the morning, then some lingering showers still possible this afternoon. High near 60F. WSW winds at 15 to 25 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low around 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
